activities.name: Pushups with 20:00 Cap
activities.notes: Test: Rep-based with both reps target (50) and time cap (20:00). Should auto-end at 20:00 even if reps not finished.

activities.name: Squats - Time Cap Only
activities.notes: Test: Rep-based with ONLY time cap (5:00), no reps target. Validates that validation allows this.

activities.name: Burpees - Short Cap
activities.notes: Test: Quick 1:00 cap to test auto-end functionality quickly.
